message:
Hi Geeks,
Is it a good idea to publish my new project on github how I guarantee my copyrights ?

And I have a some problems within it :

[1] ng-href not working on mobile I don't know why .. tried installing the in app brower plugin and test again but still not working.
https://github.com/Microsmsm/Dawaey/issues/1

[2] when I type the application name in arabic to search it on the market it doesn't appear listed

[3] I am searching for bigger better database can you help please ?

[4] I am searching for partner too to launch this startup
story: Osama Soliman shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Dawaey

data.message: Amr Sobhy developed an app with the same name and purpose for drug indexes i think he might help

Only publish the code in a public repo if you intend for your project to be open source. You can then license it according to how you want to limit the use of your code. See: https://opensource.org/licenses

In your repo, you listed a CC license - you should not use that type of licenses for software. Only data, media, etc. See: https://creativecommons.org/faq/#can-i-apply-a-creative-commons-license-to-software

If you can't figure out which license to use, check out http://choosealicense.com/
هو ايه الحكمة من أنك تحطه على github وأنت مش عايزة open source ؟! ما تعمله private repo وخلاص
